effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.

short_effect.sword_shield: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with explosive fury. The lower the user's HP, the lower the move's power.
